# Sample Post

This is a sample post for testing purposes. It demonstrates various markdown features and frontmatter options.

## Features

- **Bold text** and *italic text*
- `Code snippets` and code blocks
- [Links](https://example.com) and images
- Lists and tables

## Code Example

```crystal
def hello_world
  puts "Hello, Lapis!"
end

hello_world
```
